function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation leading to increased risk of COVID-19 spread","Impact":"Higher risk of infection and potential for outbreaks","Mitigation":"Installation of effective ventilation systems, regular maintenance of filters","Technologies":"HEPA filters, mechanical ventilation systems","People":"General public, building occupants","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Air conditioners potentially contributing to the spread of COVID-19","Impact":"Increased risk of infection and outbreaks","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance of air conditioners, use of HEPA filters, adequate ventilation","Technologies":"HEPA filters, mechanical ventilation systems","People":"General public, building occupants","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Prevention of heatstroke with infection control measures","Impact":"Reduced risk of heatstroke and COVID-19 infection","Mitigation":"Proper use of air conditioners, implementation of mechanical ventilation","Technologies":"24-hour mechanical ventilation systems","People":"General public, building occupants","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"}]}
